title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, there are N redraws of the entire client area. This is inefficient and results in slow performance.
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: There should only be one redraw for each visible line.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the test case below.
2. Append multiple lines to the StyledText component in word wrap mode.
3. Observe the redraw behavior and performance of the application.
